geneVariantDescriptions.description: MYD88 S244A lies within the TIR domain of the Myd88 protein (UniProt.org). S244A confers a loss of function to the Myd88 protein as demonstrated by decreased NF-kappaB activity compared to wild-type, and disruption of both Myd88 homodimerization and recruitment of IL-1 receptor-associated kinases in culture (PMID: 24019529).

references.title: Mutational analysis identifies residues crucial for homodimerization of myeloid differentiation factor 88 (MyD88) and for its function in immune cells.
